tr_updateDescription: A new version of Organized is available
tr_appAboutDesc:
Organized is designed for use by Jehovah’s Witnesses congregations. Its goal is to simplify and speed up all congregation planning tasks and improve assignment tracking for everyone.

Plan midweek and weekend meetings effortlessly, send reports, and view your assigned parts with just a few clicks. This app is designed for anyone in the congregation to use and benefit from.

We’re actively enhancing Organized to release even more features in the future. You can help us bring these exciting features sooner! You can support us through voluntary donations or by assisting in developing next versions of Organized.
tr_supportAppDesc: Organized is a free app, and we’re happy to develop and share it with you. While we work on it with enthusiasm, maintaining it costs money. If you’d like to show your appreciation, your support would be greatly appreciated!
tr_supportAppOption1Desc: Your donations help Organized stay free for congregations. They cover server costs and help us to build new features faster. Your generosity supports congregations worldwide!
tr_supportAppOption2Desc:
We’d appreciate your help in the following areas:

  • React development
  • UI/UX Design
  • App translation

If you can help in any of these areas, please contact us. Let’s work together to improve Organized!

Also, recommending Organized to others extends its reach and benefits congregations. Any way you contribute truly enhances the app, making it better for everyone.
tr_themeFollowOSDisableDesc: Als je het thema weer op automatisch wilt zetten, kan je dit doen in je accountinstellingen
tr_2FATokenInvalidExpired: The code is invalid or expired. Please try again.
tr_featureComingSoonDesc: This feature is not available yet. We are currently working on it. Stay tuned!
tr_pinRequired: To view or edit this information, please enter your personal PIN code used to unlock the app.
tr_changeAccessCodeDesc: We advise changing the code only if unauthorized access to it is suspected. After creating a new code, securely note and share it with new Organized users in your congregation.
tr_noPersonsFoundDesc: No persons match your search parameters. Please try adjusting the category or date.
tr_wholeYearIsSelected: De 'Volledig jaar' optie is momenteel geselecteerd
tr_forceRefreshButtonTooltip: Forceer vernieuwen van de app om te controleren op updates als ze niet worden weergegeven. Er worden geen gegevens gewist.
tr_userRoleChangedDesc: Je toegangsrechten in Organized zijn recent gewijzigd. Log opnieuw in op je account zodat de wijzigingen van kracht worden.
tr_personHasNoAssignmentHistory: Deze persoon heeft nog geen geschiedenis in toewijzingen
tr_appUserProfileNotRegisteredDesc: Deze persoon gebruikt de app nog niet. U kunt een Organized account voor deze persoon aanmaken op de 'Gebruikersaccounts' pagina.
tr_appUserProfileRegisteredDesc: Deze persoon maakt al gebruik van Organized. Laatste keer online: {{ lastTimeOnline }}. Bewerk andere rechten en instelling op de 'Gebruikersaccounts' pagina.
tr_consoleWarningDesc: Deze console is een krachtig hulpmiddel bedoeld voor ontwikkelaars. Als je geen ontwikkelaar bent, vermijd dan hier commando's in te voeren of te plakken - zelfs als iemand dit aan je vraagt. Dit zorgt ervoor dat je Organized app-gegevens altijd veilig blijven.
tr_offlineLocked: Je moet verbonden zijn om een wijziging aan te brengen
